name: MKLocalSearch.ResultType
desc: Options that indicate types of search results.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Create a search result type from the provided value.

items.name: static var address: MKLocalSearch.ResultType
items.desc: Value indicating that search result should include addresses.

items.name: static var pointOfInterest: MKLocalSearch.ResultType
items.desc: Value indicating that search results should include points of interest.
